Direzione o partecipazione a comitati ed.content: *Member, Advisory Board of Economia e Politica Industriale - Journal of Industrial and Business Economics, since January 2015.

*Invited Guest Editor (with Stephane Saussier, Paris 1 Pantheon Sorbonne) for the Special Issue on "Public Procurement: new issues, theories and datasets", Economia e Politica Industriale - Journal of Industrial and Business Economics

Organizzazione o partecipazione come rel.content: ORGANISER - Seminars on "Competition and Regulation Policies", at the Department of Economics and Management, one seminar every month, 2002-15.
ORGANISER - Workshop on "How do Governance Complexity and Financial Constraints affect Public-Private Contracts? Theory and Empirical Evidence", 11/04/2014;

ORGANISER - Workshop for the Project Cofin- MIUR 2008-2010 (funded for 2010-2012), May, 6-7, 2010; Workshop for the Project Cofin-MIUR 2006-2008, 8-9/02/2007; Workshop for the Project Cofin- MIUR 2004-2006, 31/03 and 1/04/2005;
ORGANISER - Institutional Conference (in Italian) on "Liberalizzazione nei mercati delle public utility in Italia: effetti distributivi e consumi delle famiglie", 05/6/05

ORGANISER - Institutional Conference on "Politiche di liberalizzazione e concorrenza in Italia:Proposte di riforma e linee di intervento settoriali", 19/10/2007, Presentation of the book edited by Pammolli F., Cambini C. and A. Giannaccari (Carocci, Rome)
ORGANIZER - International Workshop at the Florence School of Regulation, European University Institute, Florence, October, 3, 2008 "Aff ordability in Public Utility Sectors".

RECENT PARTICIPATION TO INTERNATIONAL WORKSHOPS AND CONFERENCE, 2009-2016 (presentations and invited presentation): 2016 - Icare 2016, University of Essex; Lisbon, EARIE 2016; Paris, Chaire EPPP, IAE Pantheon-Sorbonne, invited; Paris-Nanterre, invited; GreenordestEnergy, University of Padua, invited; 2nd Berkeley-Paris Organizational Economics Workshop - University of Paris 1 - Pantheon - Sorbonne, invited. 2015 - Paris School of Economic; Paris 1, Pantheon-Sorbonne, invited; Workshop on Organizational Economics at the University of California, Berkeley, invited; Workshop on Public-Private Partnerships: Design and Deliberation, Higher School of Economics, Moscow-Perm; iCare, Conference, Higher School of Economics, Moscow-Perm; Dept. of Economics, University of Leicester, invited. 2014 - Mediterranean Energy Regulators (Medreg) Working Group on Consumer Issues, Cairo, invited keynote; ICAREs2, NRU-HSE, Moscow-Perm, invited; "The Economics and Political Economy of Energy Subsidies", CESifo, San Servolo Venezia; Conference: "Energy Poverty and Energy Access: Global Challenges and Goals", FEEM, Milan; Seminar at the Dept. of Economics, Univ. of Trento, invited; First Brazilian Conference Series on Public Procurement and Concession Design, San Paulo and Rio de Janeiro, invited; Paris 1- Pantheon - Sorbonne, Department Seminar. 2013 - Società Italiana degli Economisti (SIE), Bologna: Coordinator of the Session on "Public Procurement and Private-Public Partnership"; Società Italiana di Economia Pubblica (SIEP), Pavia; The International Society for New Institutional Economics (ISNIE), Firenze; 11th International Industrial Organization Conference, Boston; Florence School of Regulation, European University Institute, Firenze, International Workshop: "Smart governance and regulation of water services in Europe", invited; European Union, Bruxelles: DG ENERGY and DG SANCO, "Workshop on Vulnerable Consumers", invited keynote. 2012 - Journadas de Economia Industrial, Murcia; European Association of Research in Industrial Economics (EARIE), Rome; Paris, Chaire EPPP, IAE Pantheon-Sorbonne, Conference on: "Contracts, Procurements, Public-Private Arrangements", WKS on Governance Structures and E ciency for Water in Europe, Chaire EPPP, IAE Pantheon - Sorbonne; CERRE, Bruxelles: Workshop on "Analysing the role of consumers in regulated markets", invited. 2011 - University of Innsbruck, Department of Public Economics, Invited; Bank of Italy, Conference on the Economy in the North-East: Discussant for the Session on "Material and Immaterial Infrastructures"; Toulouse School of Economics: Workshop on Infrastructure, Procurement and Corruption, invited; Conference: "Contracts, Procurements, Public-Private Arrangements", Paris 1, Pantheon-Sorbonne. 2010 - Società Italiana degli Economisti, SIE, Catania; Workshop of the Bank of Italy on the Project on Infrastructure, Perugia, Sa.Di.Ba; Seminar at the Dept. of Economics, Università of Firenze, invited; Copenhagen Business School, Seminar at the Department of Economics, invited; Conference: "Contracts, Procurements, Public-Private Arrangements", Paris 1 - Sorbonne; Seminar at the Dept. of Economics, Università Cattolica, Milano, invited. 2009 - Dept. Seminar at the Dept. of Economics, Univ. of Bologna, invited; Società Italiana degli Economisti, SIE, Roma; European Economic Association, EEA, Barcelona; Workshop: Per una gestione sostenibile delle risorse idriche, ISAE, Roma, invited; Ischia, Advancement of Economic Theory (VC SAET); Lecce, Workshop on Industrial Organization: Theory, Empirics and Experiment; RES, Royal Economic Society, University of Surrey; Seminar at the Dept. of Economics, Univ. of Trento, invited.

ORGANISER - International Conference on "Public Procurement and Sustainable Growth", jointly organised with A. Estache (Ecares and CEPR) at San Servolo (Venice), 20-21 October, 2011 - as conclusion of the research project "Contract enforcement and contract design in public utility: evidence from public procurement".
INVITED KEYNOTE: European Union, Bruxelles: DG ENERGY and DG SANCO, "Workshop on Vulnerable Consumers", invited keynote on: "Affordability in energy consumption"

ORGANISER - Conference on "Sustainable Public Procurement: research trends and new challenges", HSE- NRU, Moscow, October 4-5, 2013, jointly with E. Podkolzina (HSE-NRU, Moscow) and C. Staropoli (Universitè Paris 1 - Pantheon, Sorbonne)
INVITED KEYNOTE: Mediterranean Energy Regulators (Medreg) Working Group on Consumer Issues, Cairo, invited keynote on "Affordability in energy consumption: measures and policy"

ORGANISER - Institutional Conference (in Italian) on "L'efficienza della spesa pubblica: in focus sui contratti pubblico-privati" (The efficiency of public spending: a focus on public-private contracts) - 10/04/2014;

ORGANISER: Presentation of the Book: "Riforme elettriche tra efficienza ed equità", Clo' A., Clo' S. and F. Boffa (Editors), Il Mulino, Bologna, Centro Studi Giorgio Levi Cases, University of Padua, 25/03/2015;
ORGANISER - I^ International Workshop on "Public Private Partnerships: Design and Deliberation", 24/09/2015, HSE- NRU, Moscow and Perm;
ORGANISER - Institutional Conference - "Energia della Ragione", Centro Studi Giorgio Levi Cases, 28/05/2016;
ORGANISER - 2^ International Workshop on "Public Private Partnerships: Design and Deliberation", 27-28/10/2016, HSE- NRU, Moscow and Perm

Responsabilita' di studi e ricerche scie.content: - January - April 1997: STET-Telecom Italia, Centro Telecom San Salvador in Venice, External Consultant, Report on: "Privatisation of public utilities: the case of telecommunications" , (with G. De Fraja)

- December 2000 - February 2002: Italian Ministry of Environmental Policy, External Consultant for the "Revision of the National Tariff Method in the Water Sector" . Contribution to the Report (coordinated by L. Bardelli) on: "Proposal to the Italian Ministry of Environmental Policy for the Revision of the Water Tariff System". (Proposta al Ministro dell'Ambiente e Tutela del Territorio di Revisione del D.M. 1 agosto 1996: Revisione del Metodo Tariffario Normalizzato per definire le componenti di costo e determinare la tariffa di riferimento del servizio idrico integrato").
July 2002 - February 2004: Veneto Region, External Consultant to the staff in charge to write down the proposal for the "Regional Law on Multiutility" in Veneto.

- December 2004 - January 2005: Veneto Region, External Consultant to the staff in charge to design the "Tariffs for the wastewater treatments in the Fusina's Integrated Project" , (with C. D'Alpaos).

- February 2005 - June 2006: Veneto Region - External Consultant in the research project: " Economic Analysis for the Water Integrated System in the Veneto Region". Report on "Economic value of the water uses", (with G. Muraro, C. D'Alpaos, M. Moretto, C. Dosi).

- November 2005 - February 2006: The World Bank, External Consultant in the research project: "Restructuring the Serbian Infrastructure Sectors: Distributive Impacts" , Washington, (with R. Miniaci and C. Scarpa).

November 2008 - December 2008: The World Bank - External Consultant in the project: "Affordability in public utility services: an analysis of distributive impacts in Western Africa", Washington, (with R. Miniaci and C. Scarpa).

- January 2009 - March 2009: Italian Authority for Electricity and Gas, External Consultant in the project "Affordability and social tariffs in gas consumption" . Report on: "The design of social tariffs for the Italian gas sector", (with R. Miniaci and C. Scarpa).

- February 2014 - July 2014: Italian Authority for Electricity and Gas, External Consultant in the project "Affordability and social tariffs in gas and electricity consumption". Report on: "The families expenditure in energy and the Italian benefits programme" , (with R. Miniaci and C. Scarpa).

- November 2015 - July 2016: The Institute for Prospective Technological Studies (IPTS) - Directorate General Joint Research Centre (DG JRC), European Union. Reports on: a."Inducement prizes for ICT innovation" and b."Innovation vouchers for ICT" .

Conseguimento di premi e riconoscimenti.content: International Conferences and Workshops' Scientific Committee, Member: AIEE Energy Symposium on "Current and Future Challenges to Energy Security", Milan, 30/11 - 2/12/2016; International Conference of Applied Research in Economics and Finance, iCare 6, Essex Business School 25-26 September 2016, coorganised by HSE-NRU, Moscow-Perm, Russia and Essex Business School, University of Essex, Colchester; International Conference of Applied Research in Economics, iCare 5, 21-23 September, HSE - NRU, Moscow and Perm, Russia; Workshop on Economics and Management of Public Private Partnerships, CRIEP, University of Padova and Proxenter, San Servolo Island, Venice, September 14-15, 2015.
Research Fellow, IEFE - Centre for Research on Energy and Environmental Economics and Policy, Bocconi University, Milan.
Research Fellow, Proxenter (Center of Research in Procurement and Supply Chain), University of Rome "Tor Vergata" .
Research Professor at Higher School of Economics, National Research University, Moscow (Leading Researcher for the Public-Private Interaction Center)
French Quali fication "Aux fonctions de Professeur en Sciences Economiques". Conseil National des Universites, France, no. N. 15105277361, since February 2015.

Partecipazione al collegio dei docenti o.content: MEMBER IN Ph.D COMMITTEES: - - Ph.D Defense of Elisa Colorito - Department of Social and Economic Science, University of Rome, La Sapienza, November 2016. - Ph.D Defense of Olga Chiappinelli - IMT Institute for Advanced Studies - Lucca, July 2015. - Ph.D Defense of Julie de Brux - Institute of Business Administration (IAE) - University Paris 1, Pantheon - Sorbonne, November 2011. - Ph.D Defense of Roberta Sestini at University of Rome Tor Vergata, May 2003.

Formale attribuzione di incarichi di ins.content: PhD Courses: Public-Private Contracts (University of Padua); Microeconomics (University of Padua); Topics in Industrial Organization (University of Padua); Regulatory issues in public procurement (Ph.D Summer School - European School of New Institutional Economics - ESNIE, 2014, Cargese); Public-Private Contracts (Ph.D Summer School, 2016 - Higher School of Economics, National Research University, Moscow).

Responsabilita' scientifica per progetti.content: - Scientific Coordinator of the local unit at the Department of Economics, University of Padua of the following COFIN-MIUR national projects (funded by the Italian Ministry of Education): 2008-10: "Contracts, incentives, productive efficiency and consumers' protection in the provision of public utilities" , 49.572 euro. 2006-08: "Contracts, Regulation and competition in public utilities with two-ways networks", 55.000 euro. 2004-06: "Externality, costs and investments in regulated sectors: effcient regulation and effective competition" , 38.800 euro . 2002-04: "Regulation, access and technological innovation in network industries", 41.833 euro. 2000-02: "Competition and Sectoral Authorities in technological industries", (local coordinator in the first year: prof. Piero Tedeschi).
